729829f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Glen Street
729829f-a.text:
4246 Victory Boulevard, east side, about 200
feet south of Glen Street. It appears on the James Butler
map of 1853 as the A. Simonson house; in 1874 it belonged to
L. Morgan.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729829f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Glen Street, Staten Island, NY

729846f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Glen Street
729846f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, east side, at the head of Glen
Street. The maps of 1898 and 1907 khow the house to have
been owned by members of the Koerner family.
May 19, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729846f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Glen Street, Staten Island, NY
